entry: Installed Tailwind for Astro via `@tailwindcss/vite`; Tailwind is imported in `src/styles/global.css`, and `astro.config.mjs` includes the Vite plugin.
Added design tokens to Tailwind `@theme` in `src/styles/global.css` and mapped reusable helpers (`.cs-topper`, `.cs-title`, `.cs-text`) to Tailwind utilities.
Created `src/data/navData.json` to drive dynamic navigation, including nested dropdown items.
Built `src/components/Navbar.astro` as a Tailwind-only navbar using `navData` for links and dropdowns, with mobile toggle + dropdown logic.
Implemented dropdown UI fixes: aligned triggers, added caret icon, light border around dropdowns, and removed desktop scrollbar issues by enabling `lg:overflow-visible`.
Created `src/components/Hero.astro` as a hero section converted from `convert.html` and `convert.css` (background image, overlay, content, and buttons).
Beads issues `brushmountain-1q1` and `brushmountain-99a` were created and closed after completion.
Added docs/core-styles.md documenting design tokens and core helper classes.
Updated `AGENTS.md` with working agreement and MCP usage directives.
Dropdown misalignment: added flex alignment classes to keep dropdown triggers level with other nav items.
Dropdown action unreliable on mobile: added explicit open/close logic, aria state, and "close others" behavior.
Desktop hover created scrollbars: added `lg:overflow-visible` on the nav list to avoid overflow clipping.
Duplicate nav rendering: removed nav from `Hero.astro` and rebuilt it as a true hero section when `convert.html` was updated.
Hero not showing under navbar: identified fixed header overlap; switched hero to a normal section and used updated content from `convert.html`.
Converted `convert.html` and `convert.css` into `src/components/Hero.astro` with Tailwind and rendered it in `src/pages/index.astro`.
